option.value:
Ahmed Marzougui
  • Home

  • Experience
  • Education
  • Languages
  • Contact

Ahmed Marzougui

DevOps Engineer —

View My Work

About Me

I am a final-year engineering student specializing in IT Infrastructure & Cloud Computing. Passionate about Kubernetes, CI/CD, Terraform, and AWS, I am seeking a 6-month full-time graduation internship in Cloud/DevOps starting December 2025.

Motivated, adaptable, and eager to contribute to cloud-native environments and innovative teams.

Download CV

Skills

Programming

Python
Java
JavaScript
PHP
C/C++
Shell Script
Go

Frameworks / Tools

Spring Boot
Angular
Symfony
.NET
Docker
Kubernetes
Jenkins
MySQL
Nginx
GitLab

Virtualization / Systems

QEMU/KVM
OCI/Docker Images
Microservices Architecture

Cloud / DevOps

AWS
Terraform
OpenStack
Ansible
Grafana
GitLab
OpenShift
Argo CD
Helm
ELK Stack

Networking

AWS VPC
BGP (GNS3)
Juniper vSRX
Fortinet FortiGate
Firewall
NAT

Projects

Terraform VPC Automation

Infrastructure-as-Code modules to standardize secure AWS network foundations.

  • Designed reusable Terraform modules (VPC, subnets, routing, security, NAT, IGW).
  • Enforced tagging, CIDR governance and consistent multi-env layouts (dev/stage/prod).
  • Cut manual provisioning time by 70% and reduced config drift to near zero.
Stack: Terraform • AWS VPC • IAM • Remote State (S3 + DynamoDB) • Modules
GitHub
Automated KVM Virtual Lab

Local cloud lab enabling rapid reproducible environments for DevOps experiments.

  • Automated VM lifecycle with Ansible, libvirt & cloud-init (networks, users, SSH, packages).
  • Reduced environment setup from several hours to under 10 minutes.
  • Supports iterative testing of CI/CD, container runtimes and clustering scenarios.
Stack: Ansible • KVM/libvirt • Cloud-init • Linux Networking • Automation
Dev.to Article GitHub
AWS 3‑Tier Architecture

Production-ready, fault-tolerant baseline for web / API workloads.

  • Isolated tiers (public, private, db) with security groups and NACL hardening.
  • Auto Scaling + ALB for resilient stateless application layer.
  • Multi-AZ Aurora MySQL ensuring high availability and durability.
Stack: AWS VPC • EC2 • ALB • ASG • Aurora MySQL • IAM • CloudWatch
GitHub
GitLab CI/CD Helm Deployments to EKS

Automated, policy-driven Kubernetes delivery pipeline.

  • Packaged microservice with custom Helm chart (values segregation per environment).
  • GitLab pipeline stages: build, scan, chart lint, deploy (review → staging → prod gates).
  • Reduced manual release overhead and improved rollback confidence.
Stack: GitLab CI • Helm • Amazon EKS • Docker • Registry • RBAC
Medium Guide GitLab Project
Serverless Secure File Sharing Platform

Scalable, low-ops collaboration system with fine-grained access controls.

  • Authentication & user pools via Cognito (token-based secured API Gateway access).
  • Lambda functions orchestrating file lifecycle with encrypted storage.
  • Integrated WAF & logging for auditability and attack surface reduction.
Stack: React • Cognito • API Gateway • Lambda • EFS • KMS • WAF • CloudWatch
GitHub
Hybrid OpenStack Private Cloud & AI Platform

Educational + compute platform bridging private and public cloud.

  • Provisioned multi-node OpenStack cluster (compute, networking, storage orchestration).
  • Deployed AI-focused workloads (Kubernetes + MySQL) internally; integrated AWS for burst.
  • Central observability with Grafana dashboards (capacity + performance insights).
Stack: OpenStack • Ansible • Kubernetes • Docker • MySQL • AWS EC2/S3 • Grafana
Spring Boot on AWS ECS Fargate

Containerized service with automated continuous delivery and scaling.

  • CI/CD pipeline (GitHub → CodePipeline → CodeBuild → ECR → ECS deployment).
  • Zero-downtime rolling updates with health checks & auto scaling policies.
  • Improved release cadence and reduced operational overhead.
Stack: Spring Boot • Docker • ECS Fargate • ECR • CodePipeline • CodeBuild
GitHub
Node.js Kubernetes CI/CD Pipeline

End-to-end delivery workflow emphasizing quality gates and observability.

  • Integrated static analysis, container build, image scanning and deploy stages.
  • Automated notifications (Slack) and runtime monitoring hooks.
  • Accelerated feedback loops and reduced regression risk.
Stack: Jenkins • Docker • Kubernetes • Node.js • Static Analysis • Slack API
CI/CD Pipeline Optimization

Refined delivery platform for faster, more reliable releases.

  • Introduced parallel stages, caching & immutable artifact strategy (50+ builds).
  • Achieved deploys in under 5 minutes and lowered manual intervention by 30%.
  • Real-time telemetry improved MTTR on failed builds.
Stack: Jenkins • Ansible • Docker • GitHub • AWS EC2 • Monitoring

Experience

DevSecOps Intern — ST2I
Tunisia • Jun 2025 – Sep 2025
  • Migrated Spring Boot microservices to OpenShift with Helm, RBAC and environment parity (dev/stage/prod); deploy time −87% (45m → 6m), 99.3% rollout success.
  • Implemented GitOps with Argo CD and trunk-based flow; lead time for change −72%, change fail rate −4× through protected pipelines.
  • Hardened CI/CD (GitLab CI, Trivy, SonarQube): 95% critical vulns blocked pre-prod, −35% code smells, −28% image size.
  • Operationalized observability (Prometheus, Grafana, alerting): 99.5% uptime SLO, MTTR 24m (−60%).
−87% deploy time 95% vulns blocked 99.5% uptime
OpenShift Helm Argo CD GitLab CI Trivy SonarQube Prometheus Grafana Spring Boot Kubernetes
View Project
DevOps Intern — SOCOOPEC
Tunisia • Jun 2024 – Jul 2024
  • Built a stock management app (Angular + Spring Boot, JWT, RBAC) covering core inventory and order workflows.
  • Containerized and automated delivery with GitHub Actions → AWS EC2 behind Nginx; blue/green releases, deploy < 5 min, −80% manual ops.
  • Improved runtime with Nginx caching/compression and logs/metrics; faster TTFB and simpler troubleshooting.
< 5 min deploy −80% manual work Faster TTFB
Angular Spring Boot JWT GitHub Actions Docker AWS EC2 Nginx
View Project

Education

  • IT Infrastructure and Cloud Technology Engineering - Private Higher School of Engineering and Technologies (2022–Present)
  • Mathematics and Physics Preparatory Cycle - Higher Institute of Applied Sciences and Technology of Mahdia, Tunisia (2019–2022)

Languages

  • French (B2)
  • English (B2)
  • German (A2)
  • Arabic (C2)

Contact

© 2025 Ahmed Marzougui. All rights reserved.
